summary: Artisan Hub Marketplace - Online marketplace for creatives to showcase and sell original work (3D prints, ceramics, paintings, music, videos). Features artist profiles with Stripe Connect integration, multi-photo upload, AI-generated descriptions, secure payments with 90% artist revenue share (10% admin commission), admin dashboard, and support for donations, job offerings, and gigs.
architectural_notes: Stripe Connect for artist payment accounts - payments go directly to artist with 10% commission to admin
90% revenue share to artists, 10% commission to platform
Priority: Immediate checkout first, shopping cart deferred
Focus on artist onboarding and Stripe integration as primary flow
Multi-photo upload allows custom category names per upload (artist-defined)
AI-generated descriptions are editable by artists at any time
Revenue share percentages (90%/10%) should only be visible in admin dashboard and artist private dashboards, not on any public-facing pages
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Artist store banner placeholder image with abstract artistic pattern for store customization (store-banner-placeholder.dim_1200x300.png)

existing_features.title: Create admin dashboard with branding and site configuration settings including site name, logo upload, color scheme customization, and tagline
Implement user management interface for admin to view all registered artists, their status, total sales, and ability to activate/deactivate artist accounts

Build revenue tracking and analytics dashboard showing total platform revenue, admin commission earned (10% of all sales), total artist earnings (90% share), number of transactions, and revenue trends over time
Create commission settings interface allowing admin to view and configure the platform commission rate, defaulting to 10%
Implement Stripe Connect onboarding flow for artists to link existing Stripe accounts or create new ones, storing Stripe account ID securely in artist profile
Implement immediate checkout flow without shopping cart functionality, allowing buyers to purchase one item at a time using Stripe checkout

Display artist benefits prominently on artist onboarding and profile pages: global exposure through marketplace listing, secure Stripe payment processing, easy item management tools, and 90% revenue share retention

Add a custom category name input field to the product upload form that allows artists to specify a unique category label for each product listing (e.g., 'Ceramic Bowls', 'Abstract Series', 'Nature Photography')
Display the custom category name on product cards in the marketplace listing and product detail views so buyers can see how artists have categorized their work

Implement AI-generated product descriptions that automatically create compelling text from uploaded product images, with the description pre-populated in an editable text field that artists can modify at any time before or after publishing
Remove all references to '90% revenue share', '10% commission', and any percentage-based revenue information from the ArtistBenefits component displayed on public-facing pages
Remove the text '90% of your payment goes directly to the artist' from the PaymentSuccess page
Ensure revenue share information remains visible to artists in their private ArtistDashboard and any artist-specific profile settings
Add bulk image upload functionality to the artist dashboard that allows artists to select multiple image files at once and automatically create a separate product listing for each uploaded image
Create a donation creation flow in the artist dashboard that allows artists to set up donation options with customizable amounts, descriptions, and optional suggested amounts
Implement separate filtering and display sections in the marketplace listing page to show products and donations in distinct areas
Add a store settings interface for artists to customize their store presentation including store name, bio, banner image, and social media links
Create a public artist store page that displays an individual artist's products and donations with their customized store branding and settings
Add navigation from product cards in the main marketplace to individual artist store pages so buyers can explore all items from a specific artist

new_feature_requests.summary: Artist profiles with Stripe Connect integration
Secure Stripe payments with immediate checkout
Admin dashboard for branding and site configuration

Configure payment processing so that when a buyer purchases an item, payment goes directly to the artist's Stripe account with 10% commission automatically deducted and sent to the admin's Stripe account
Update the Product data model in the backend to include a categoryName field of type Text that stores the artist's custom category label for each product
Remove revenue/percentage information from all public-facing pages while keeping it visible in admin dashboard and artist private dashboards
Remove all revenue percentage mentions from the ArtistRegistration page including any text about revenue share or commission rates
Ensure CommissionSettings component remains visible and functional in the admin dashboard for viewing and configuring platform commission rates
Ensure RevenueAnalytics component remains visible in the admin dashboard showing total platform revenue, admin commission earned, total artist earnings, and transaction counts
Update the Product data model in the backend to include a productType field that distinguishes between 'product' and 'donation' types
